entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who thinks highly of Harry and holds him in great esteem. He is described as a tall form unfolding from the fire.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who feels guilty and trapped inside his own head and body. He is also described as being smiled upon by another character.

entities.name: thornton
entities.description: Thornton is not explicitly mentioned in the text but he is referred to as 'he' when talking about himself on the throne like chair

relationships.description: Dumbledore thinks highly of Harry, as mentioned in the text.
